channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why there's an AI bubble and why you shouldn't ignore it
item.description: We may well be in an AI bubble — the money, momentum and magical thinking all point that way. Why it matters: A financial bubble doesn't mean AI won't...

item.title: Where homes are losing value most
item.description: Data: Zillow ; Map: Kavya Beheraj/Axios Over half (53%) of U.S. homes lost value in the past year, according to Zillow. Why it matters: That's the mos...

item.title: AI boom fuels "environmental justice" fears in communities of color
item.description: Civil rights groups are increasingly concerned that AI's rapidly spreading physical infrastructure is deepening climate burdens for communities of col...

item.title: Behind the Curtain: Trump bets his presidency and GOP's future on AI
item.description: President Trump is betting his presidency — and the future of the GOP — on lightly regulated, fast expansion of AI . Why it matters: Yes, Trump zigs a...

item.title: Democrats, who bludgeoned Trump on immigration in term 1, have grown quiet
item.description: Democrats struggle to counter Trump’s tougher policies on immigration.

item.title: Venezuela’s Maduro, shaken but still standing, aims to wait out Trump
item.description: Five months into the U.S. military buildup in the Caribbean, Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro is feeling the pressure but refusing to go into exile...

item.title: Trump pardons major drug traffickers despite his anti-drug rhetoric
item.description: The president has granted clemency to about 100 people accused of drug-related crimes during his two terms in office, a Post analysis shows.

item.title: Trump pardoned him days ago. Now he's furious the Democrat is running for reelection.
item.description: President Trump blasted Rep. Henry Cuellar on Sunday for "a lack of LOYALTY" days after he pardoned the Texas Democrat in a shock move last week. The ...

item.title: Trump lashes out at Cuellar for running again as a Democrat after pardon
item.description: Rep. Henry Cuellar, who was charged with bribery in 2024, says he is firmly a Democrat but a bipartisan one who can work with the president.

item.title: Mom of Karoline Leavitt’s nephew rejects White House narrative of her ICE arrest
item.description: In an interview, Bruna Ferreira, who chose the White House press secretary as her son’s godmother, contested the portrayal of her as a criminal, absen...

item.title: How Russia keeps raising an army to replace its dead
item.description: An online bazaar of freelance headhunters finds new recruits to fight Ukraine, emboldening Vladimir Putin at the negotiating table and scaring Europea...

item.title: White House bullish on economic growth as Thanksgiving spending rises
item.description: Economic adviser Kevin Hassett dismissed economic bedwetters, saying strong spending bodes well for the economy.

item.title: Trump, stung by Republican losses, stands his ground on affordability
item.description: Democrats running on cost-of-living anxieties outperformed Republicans in Tuesday’s elections by greater-than-expected margins. The president chalked ...

item.title: Voters on Tuesday rewarded Democrats who addressed economic costs. Hours later, Trump said he delivered an 'economic miracle.'
item.description: A recent poll found a majority of Americans feel they’re spending more on groceries than they did a year ago.

item.title: Reaganomics in Jersey: Jack Ciattarelli has a supply-side dream if he’s elected governor this week
item.description: The Republican nominee has promised tax cuts and economic growth, but the numbers are fuzzy.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
